definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Copper columns, bonded with top and bottom plate.
sentences.chinese: 铜柱，和上下盖铜板接合。

sentences.english: Now, with training, we can see the other side of the coin.
sentences.chinese: 现在经过训练，我看到了铜板的另一面。

sentences.english: I only need a thousand more pennies to buy my airplane.
sentences.chinese: 我只要在有一千个一角的铜板，就能买一架飞机了。

sentences.english: This mental-physical phenomenon is like a coin with two sides.
sentences.chinese: 这一种身心现象就像一个铜板的两面。

sentences.english: Not a copper farthing's worth of it!
Anybody got a coin? I'm playing scratch lotto.
sentences.chinese: 有人有铜板吗？我正在玩刮刮乐。

sentences.english: After more surges, the silver completely melted away, leaving only the tungsten core with its thin copper plating.
sentences.chinese: 更多浪涌后，银板完全熔化，只留下带薄铜板的钨核。

sentences.english: The first daughter responds to charges of hoarding taxpayer nickels.
sentences.chinese: 美国第一女儿回应对她囤积纳税人铜板的指控。

sentences.english: You will need your own CCL.
sentences.chinese: 您将需要您自己的覆铜板。

sentences.english: With plenty of experiments, the parameters of copperplate friction stir welding are optimized.
sentences.chinese: 通过大量试验分析，优化了铜板搅拌摩擦焊接工艺。

sentences.english: Thus enters the young protagonist of Robots, Rodney Copperbottom.
sentences.chinese: 于是一个机器人新主角，用铜板包底的罗德尼出现了。

sentences.english: Anybody got a coin? I am playing scratch lotto.
sentences.chinese: 有人有铜板吗？我正在玩刮刮奖。

definition: silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
high denomination of banknotes or coins/lots of money/a big sum (e.g. a bribe)
(in former times) banknote with a value in silver
to scatter money/to give to charity
small sum of money/loose change/Cantonese equivalent of 零錢|零钱[ling2 qian2]
banknote in Jiao units (Mao, one-tenth of yuan)
